body.head: 74/578/Euratom: Commission Decision of 13 November 1974 amending the Decision of 13 January 1971 with regard to the place of work of the Director-General of the Joint Nuclear Research Centre (JRC) and its departments
body.p: COMMISSION DECISION of 13 November 1974 amending the Decision of 13 January 1971 with regard to the place of work of the Director-General of the Joint Nuclear Research Centre (JRC) and its departments (74/578/Euratom)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Atomic Energy Community, and in particular Article 8 thereof;
Whereas the Commission adopted a Decision on the reorganization of the Joint Nuclear Research Centre (JRC) on 13 January 1971 (1);
Whereas the abovementioned Decision should be amended as regards the place of work of the Director General of the JRC,
Article 3 (2) of the Commission Decision of 13 January 1971 shall be amended as follows:
"Brussels is the place of work of the Director-General and the departments directly attached to him."
